mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no, u.user_no, u.user_nick, u.profile_image, p.text_content, p.post_date, p.like_cnt , p.comment_cnt , p.share_cnt, p.post_link, IF(p.post_no IN (SELECT post_no FROM postlike WHERE user_no = #{user_no}), "Y", "N") isLike FROM giggledbaws.user u INNER JOIN giggledbaws.post p ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.user_no NOT IN (SELECT block_user FROM block WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) AND p.user_no NOT IN (SELECT user_no FROM block WHERE block_user = #{user_no}) ORDER BY p.post_no desc;

SELECT p.post_no, u.user_no, u.user_nick, u.profile_image, p.text_content, p.post_date, p.like_cnt , p.comment_cnt ,p.post_link FROM giggledbaws.user u LEFT JOIN giggledbaws.post p ON u.user_no = p.user_no WHERE p.text_content LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{keyword}, '%') AND p.user_no NOT IN (SELECT block_user FROM block WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) AND p.user_no NOT IN (SELECT user_no FROM block WHERE block_user = #{user_no}) ORDER BY p.post_date desc;
SELECT * FROM giggledbaws.user WHERE user_nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT k.user_no , p.post_no , u.user_nick, u.profile_image, p.text_content, p.post_date, p.like_cnt , p.comment_cnt ,p.share_cnt,p.post_link, IF(p.post_no IN (SELECT post_no FROM postlike WHERE user_no = #{user_no}), "Y", "N") isLike FROM giggledbaws.postlike k INNER JOIN giggledbaws.post p INNER JOIN giggledbaws.user u ON p.user_no = u.user_no ON p.post_no = k.post_no WHERE k.user_no = #{k.user_no} ORDER BY k.post_no desc;
